name: REwind (itch) (efyanez)
description:
Instructions:

  • Click to shoot in a direction
  • Hold R to rewind time

Climb as high as you can!            
_____________________________________________________

Credits:

BG Music: 80's style loop - Bones341
Menu Music: synthwave loop - Blarrgensnorf

Font: Arcade Alternate

All art done by me using PiskelApp (http://www.piskelapp.com)

All SFX done by me using bfxr (https://www.bfxr.net/)
